name: Earteknik
overview: Founded in 2001 by German and Turkish partners, the company completed R&D in 2003 and started production. Ear Teknik develops hearing systems for each age group and the company specialized in this field. The company markets its products with the brands named Earnet, Anaton, Helix and Audibel. More than 150 people are employed within the company. 350 people are employed within its associated companies. Sales services are provided by Ear Teknik sales offices in Germany and Turkey. The services are provided through dealers in 20 countries and products are marketed. Constantly improving its dealer network, Ear Teknik is determined to serve the world.
